      Methods in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data that return Till 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Till Till.load(java.lang.String pathName)
      Static method that allows a new Till object to be created containing data (such as an array of Orders) from an XML file.
      Till XML.loadTill(java.lang.String pathName)
      Reads/loads Till data from XML file to new Till object using selected file path.
      Methods in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data with parameters of type Till 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void XML.saveTill(Till till, java.lang.String pathName)
      Exports the entire Till object (taken as a parameter) to XML before saving it to the file system.
